name: idb-lite
description: Light weight indexed-db key value library matching the API of https://www.npmjs.com/package/idb-keyval"

scripts.test: npm run explain_tests && npm run launch_tests
scripts.explain_tests: echo Please open a window to /tests/index.html from the server shown below
scripts.build_watch: fswatch src | xargs -n1 -I{} npm run build

author: goofballLogic
